metadata.name: Worlds Apart
metadata.description:
In you I saw the very essence of my light

We stepped apart to come together


Two halves of a whole
Infinitely existing
Yet temporarily stunted


Lies, guilt and disappointment lingered overhead
Post battle
-
A post-war fog


Turns out I was the liar


Hypocrisy 

Thick on my breath
And heavy on my soul.
